Posts.Content: One week into my 1st chemo session FEC, really hit me hard admittance into hospital 3 day stay to feed me directly and rehydrate, but today another worring symptom which i was told might happen but my mouth is like the sand dunes! can anyone help with a solution drinking but not helping! maybe a mouthwash etc not sore yet just dry! please any help would be greatly appreciated. Izzy
Posts.Title: DRY MOUTH
